description: Pandas' DataFrame or read_csv methods should explicitlyset 'dtype' to avoid unexpected behavior.
Pandas' DataFrame or read_csv methods should explicitlyset 'dtype' to avoid unexpected behavior.
Using zeros or empty strings to initialize new DataFrame columns may cause issues. Consider using NaN (e.g., np.nan) instead.
additional_info: Column 'col1' in DataFrame 'df' is initialized with a zero or an empty string. Consider using NaN instead.
